name: The Last Stand (itch) (Blimmy Games)
description:
Survive against waves of this foreign planet's natives as you assemble mysterious devices to help your people. 

Made in 9 days for the Godot Wild jam #53 https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-53

Controls:

- Walk: Left = a  | Right = d

- Jump: Space

- Pause: p

- Fire: Left mouse click

- Aim: Mouse position

No mobile supprt

Unfortunately for reasons unknown by me, web builds don't work in non-chrome-based browsers.  a workaround for Firefox can be found at https://candordev.itch.io/foxfix, Apologies for any inconvenience this may cause and thanks for playing!
